summary: Ornate Nordic styled Buklari shield. A forerunner to the medieval \"Buckler Shield\".
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=+4][b]ORNATE BUKLARI SHIELD[/size][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35712-1-1367806387.jpg[/img][/center]


[b][size=+1]DESCRIPTION:[/size][/b]
 
Small Nordic style Buklari shield. The Buklari is a fore-runner of the more well known \"Buckler Shield\" of the medieval period. Due to it\'s size and purpose I have clasified this as a light shield for Skyrim. (pairs with my previous heavy shield release). 


[b][size=+1]INSTALLATION:[/size][/b] 

Either via Nexus Mod Manager 

[b]Or[/b]

Extract the rar file to your Skyrim installation directory. 


[b][size=+1]UNINSTALL:[/size][/b]  

Simply delete the installed files from your Skyrim installation directory or remove the mod with Nexus Mod Manager. 


[b][size=+1]INGAME:[/size][/b]  

The Buklari Shield can be crafted at any forge, recipie as follows. 

[list][*][b]2 x Leather Strips
[*]2 x Iron Ingot[/b][/list]

The shield can also be upgraded/tempered with 

[list][*][b]1 x Iron Ingot[/b][/list]

Stats are as follows. 

[list][*][b]Class: Light
[*]Armor Rating: 19
[*]Weight: 4 
[*]Value: 40[/b][/list]
author: Fortran
